flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I am going to show you, how to make a sewing kit in a jar with a pin cushion.
guide.introduction_rendered: I am going to show you, how to make a sewing kit in a jar with a pin cushion.

lines.text: Cut out a circle out of cardboard with the size of your jar top. Cut out fabric 1 inch larger.
lines.text_raw: Cut out a circle out of cardboard with the size of your jar top. Cut out fabric 1 inch larger.

lines.text: make cushion by placing batting between fabric and cardboard. Turn screw cap upside down, and apply hot glue to inside edge of rim; quickly press cushion into lid until cloth protrudes smoothly above screw cap's opening and cardboard is flush against rim.
lines.text_raw: make cushion by placing batting between fabric and cardboard. Turn screw cap upside down, and apply hot glue to inside edge of rim; quickly press cushion into lid until cloth protrudes smoothly above screw cap's opening and cardboard is flush against rim.

lines.text: Fill jar with thread, needles, zippers...anything you need for sewing. Perfect for mother's day!
lines.text_raw: Fill jar with thread, needles, zippers...anything you need for sewing. Perfect for mother's day!

guide.summary: A DIY on how to make a sewing kit with a pin cushion out of a (mason) jar.
guide.title: Sewing kit in a Jar
